snippet: No one has been able to explain why a Spanish teacher who had been fired from the Episcopal School of Jacksonville fatally shot the head of the school and himself with an assault rifle.
abstract: Community of Jacksonville, Florida, along with local authorities, struggle to explain murder-suicide committed by Spanish teacher Shane Schumerth at the St John's River school; those who knew him describe Schumerth as a quiet, dedicated teacher whose behavior had become erratic in months leading up to the shooting.
lead_paragraph: No one has been able to explain why a Spanish teacher who had been fired from the Episcopal School of Jacksonville fatally shot the head of the school and himself with an assault rifle.

headline.seo: Shooting Shatters Jacksonville Prep School Campus
headline.main: Florida Prep School Copes With Shock and Loss
headline.print_headline: Top Official Slain, Florida Prep School Copes With Shock and Loss
